name: Sudoku ∙
description:
Sudoku is now available for iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad - with a level of gameplay never seen before in the AppStore!

Discover this great version of Sudoku and join thousands of other addicted players

- "This version is really well made - clean and easy to play. My favourite."

- "Great game! I'll definitely recommend it to my friends."

DIFFERENT GAME MODES

- Four levels of difficulty - you can enjoy the game whether you're a beginner or an expert!
- Novice player? Try our beginners' sudoku, with an interactive tutorial.
- Or are you a Sudoku expert? Try the 'Impossible' level!
- Left or Right-handed

A FULL, FUN VERSION OF SUDOKU

- Each turn is automatically saved
- Prevent screen time-out during game time
- The graphics have been designed to maximise your enjoyment

Customise your game with many different in-game options, which you can turn on or off:

- Show same-value numbers entered
- Prevent same numbers from being entered
- Activate or deactivate the timer
